title: Mr. Right
description: No one has ever called Kara Stevens patient. When she wants something, she goes for it with a surefire mix of charm and perseverance. But when she wants her big brother's best friend, Grant Pearce, to be her first lover things get messy. Five years is a long time to avoid someone who is practically family, but if it wasn't for her only brother's wedding, she'd keep trying. Now there is only one question: What kind of shoes does a girl wear to see the only man who's ever broken her heart?This novella is available as a free read for members of Entranced Publishing's Readers' Club.
author: Ana Blaze
